name: Gregory Cox
coverLetter: I have been growing or around marijana crops for 15 plus years i can trim very efficient and also keep it looking great. I enjoy the work tremendously and will work whatever hours-seasons are asked of me. I am a people person and have a great work ethic. I will do any task asked of me and if i dont feel comfortable with my knowledge of certain situation i will ask someone to help so we can move foward to the next task.
